text: Zalaɠa ɠula ɠundiɠi wolai Azalia, nii é ɠɛni ga Sadɔke mavofodai ta, naa zɛba é gooɠaaʋote, é ɠɛ ma: «Kaipa nuɓusɛiti ti tɔɔzeini ga ti ɗa ʋa ga ta-vebɛaniiti Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi ma ɠoizuʋɛ, gi daamianigi zɔlɔɔgɛ gi ɓɔlɔ ba, nii è kaazu ɠaani ma ɠulapolui ɠana, mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI tuya looʋɛ nuɓusɛi ʋɛ.»
